message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you at a price of $11,000. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $9,000 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to make this deal work. Let's find a middle ground.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $9,750?
Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $9,750 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to go down to $10,250. If we can meet in the middle here, I think we can close this deal.
